data.name: Spider-Man (Symbiote)
data.description: Permanently bonded with the Venom symbiote, Spider-Man brutally takes down foes while powering up his Symbiote allies.

starItems.name: Spider-Man (Symbiote)
starItems.description: Permanently bonded with the Venom symbiote, Spider-Man brutally takes down foes while powering up his Symbiote allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> -<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be <color=#fff568>Countered</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> -<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be <color=#fff568>Countered</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> -<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be <color=#fff568>Countered</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> -<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be <color=#fff568>Countered</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>0%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> -<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be <color=#fff568>Countered</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target
Rebound Chain <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets
Always apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be <color=#fff568>Countered</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

This attack cannot be <color=#fff568>Countered</color>.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + each target has <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect prolonged by duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Each target has <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effect durations prolonged

2.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + each target has <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects prolonged by duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + each target has <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects prolonged by duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Each target has <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effect durations prolonged

4.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + each target has <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects prolonged by duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target

5.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage. Each target has <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects prolonged by duration of <color=#86e619>1</color> + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Each target has all negative effect durations prolonged

6.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage. Each target has all negative effects prolonged by duration of <color=#86e619>1</color> + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Always apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target.

7.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. Increase the duration of all their negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all targets.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all targets.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Always apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>220%</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all targets.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all targets for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>260%</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all targets for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

1.description: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, when a negative effect is applied to an enemy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self, <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color>, and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies

2.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, when a negative effect is applied to an enemy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain for self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies

3.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>:
> When a negative effect is applied to an enemy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.
> Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain for self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies

4.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>:
> When a negative effect is applied to an enemy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.
> Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade: Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health for self, <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color>, and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies

5.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>:
> When a negative effect is applied to an enemy, heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.
> Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> and <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
